Bios_Exit
void Bios_Exit(
u8 ret
) __FASTCALL

Parameters

Bios_SetKeyClick
inline void Bios_SetKeyClick(
bool enable
)

Enable or disable key click

Parameters
ret

TRUE to enable and FALSE to disable

Bios_Startup
inline void Bios_Startup()

Tests RAM and sets RAM slot for the system. Wrapper for CHKRAM routine.

u8 Bios_InterSlotRead(
u8 slot,
u16 addr
)

Reads the value of an address in another slot. Wrapper for RDSLT routine.

Bios_MainROMRead
u8 Bios_MainROMRead(
u16 addr
) __FASTCALL

Reads the value of an address in another slot. Wrapper for RDSLT routine.

Bios_InterSlotWrite
void Bios_InterSlotWrite(
u8 slot,
u16 addr,
u8 value
) __sdcccall(0)

Bios_InterSlotCall
void Bios_InterSlotCall(
u8 slot,
u16 addr
) __sdcccall(0)

Executes inter-slot call. Wrapper for CALSLT routine.

Bios_MainROMCall
void Bios_MainROMCall(
u16 addr
) __FASTCALL

Executes inter-slot call. Wrapper for CALSLT routine.

Bios_SwitchSlot
void Bios_SwitchSlot(
u8 page,
u8 slot
)

Switches indicated slot at indicated page on perpetual. Wrapper for ENASLT routine.

BIOS_CALLF

Executes an interslot call. Wrapper for CALLF routine.

Parameters
slot

Slot ID in ExxxSSPP format (must be literal value)

addr

Address of the function to be called (must be literal value)
